arts.ttl: Barcelona impresses against Getafe and remains two points behind Real Madrid
arts.sum: Dani Olmo scored and set up one of Ferran Torres' two goals with a neat backheel flick as Barcelona beat Getafe 3-0 in the Spanish league on Sunday. Ferran Torres' two goals

arts.ttl: Olmo 9.0, Torres 8.5 | FC Barcelona 3-0 Getafe: Player ratings
arts.sum: A brilliant display from FC Barcelona sees them outclass Getafe at the Estadi Johan Cruyff. Especially in the first half, Hansi Flick’s team seemed to be simply unbeatable, and they regained that momentum in the second half as well. arts.ttl: Barcelona Player Ratings vs. Getafe: Ferran Torres Leads Emphatic 3–0 Victory
arts.sum: Ferran Torres’s first half brace headlined a mature performance from Barcelona.

arts.ttl: Terrific Torres stars as Barcelona blow past Getafe to close in on La Liga leaders
arts.sum: Barcelona maintain their unbeaten start to the 2025-26 season as they blow past Getafe with a 3-0 win on Sunday night, keeping the pressure on Real Madrid at the top of La Liga.

arts.sum: Having brought home all three points from St James Park in England midweek, Barcelona took to the field once more last night – this time against Getafe late on Sunday night. Hansi Flick surprisingly did not rotate much and put up a very strong XI on the night.
